fields.name: ErrorValidationSection
fields.fieldText: You must specify a dependent termination count

fields.name: ErrorChilCountMessage
fields.fieldText: 1.You must enter the child count.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6) OR 7

fields.name: duplicateMemberWarning
fields.fieldText: NOTE : The requestor is responsible for having claims rekeyed under the correct record. If claims history exists and the comments do not state that claims have already been rekeyed under the correct record, then the request will be pended back prior to the coverage lines being termed start=stop.

fields.name: standardAltWarning
fields.fieldText:
• Standard Alt ID changes only apply to generating a new standard Alt ID for the family
  • Changes for non-standard Alt IDs are not supported through this request type
  • Requests to convert a customer to non-standard Alt IDs require BAR approval and aren't supported through this request type

By clicking Next below you agree that written approval has been received and STREAM request may be denied or pended back for proof of written approval.
